game_description: Blacktop Hoops is the ultimate arcade VR basketball game with intuitive controls which allow players to pull off insane dribble combos, break ankles, sink impressive shots, and unleash jaw-dropping dunks to defeat opponents in epic matches. Face off against streetball legends in single player with realistic AI, hoop casually in multiplayer, or climb the ranks with your crew in competitive ranked matches. With dozens of fresh fits to unlock, you can show off your unique style on the court. Blacktop Hoops is a perfect hybrid of arcade and simulation, letting you experience fast-paced authentic streetball in virtual reality.
review_2: So when you are just starting the game, people get mad at you for barely knowing how to play. I am fairly new to this game, and people always say I'm really bad when I don't do something exactly how they say to do it. People always talk bad about me in this game, and it's really annoying. Username XcomWarrior
review_5: I don’t know how to explain it, but the feeling of getting a dunk in this game is magical. It’s the best basketball game I think I’ve ever played. It transports you, as if you’re playing on a court. It has amazing detail, and amazing tricks to perform, you can also customize you character. Overall, one of the best games I’ve ever played. 10/10
